actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the limitation on the amount of private activity bonds which may be issued in a State.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the amount of private activity bonds which may be issued in a State shall be limited to an amount equal to $150 multiplied by the State's population.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the limitation on the amount of private activity bonds which may be issued in a State.
